description: Registry of available taxonomies for user-directed selection. Users specify which taxonomy to use at runtime via prompt, config, or API parameter.

taxonomies.name: AI-ML Taxonomy
taxonomies.description: Primary taxonomy for AI and ML domain. Includes tier relationships (T0-T5), PARALLEL/PERPENDICULAR/SKIP_TIER navigation patterns, and 24+ books.

taxonomies.name: Domain Taxonomy
taxonomies.description: General domain classifications for cross-cutting concerns. Covers broader software engineering and architecture patterns.
